sub_title: Structural Geologist | Salt | Caverns | Storage | Subsidence |  Specialistisch Inspecteur
summary:
I am a structural geologist with experience in seismic interpretation workflows, regional evaluation, prospect maturation and risk and volumetrics. I have proven to have project management skills, particularly in software application design, development and deployment. My  passion for a safe and caring workplace is exemplified my current role at State Supervision of Mines, and by being a trained and certified emergency response team leader.

Having spent 4 years in Shell R&D, I am keen to implement and share new technologies. Recently I started to learn the Python programming language. In addition I also thought structural geology courses. 

My main structural geological focus areas are salt tectonics and the dynamics of brittle inclusions in evaporites, fault shapes and stress reconstructions. During my MSc I build scaled analogue models of massively distant normal faults, of which you can find some movies below.

profile_positions.title: Specialistisch Inspecteur Zout, Cavernes en Opslag

profile_positions.description:
SodM maakt zich sterk voor de veiligheid
van de mens en de bescherming van het milieu bij energiewinning en het benutten van de ondergrond, nu en in de toekomst. Ik help daarbij als Senior Inspecteur - Centrale Expertiseop de dossiers Zoutwinning, Waterinjectie en Geothermie.

At the State Supervision of Mines we are commited to the safety of people and protection of the environment during energy production and use of the subsurface, now and in the future. As Inspector Subsurface I am helping with that for salt mining, water injection and geothermal energy.
profile_positions.title: Senior Inspecteur - Centrale Expertise
Associate Subject Matter Expert - Salt Tectonics
Ploegleider BHV (in-house emergency response team leader)

profile_positions.description:
Working regional to prospect scale, from crustal dynamics to well planning, in Gabon, Nigeria, Bolivia and Oman, with a strong focus on safety and structural geological aspects.
Interested in digitalisation, Python coding and new technologies and workflows.
profile_positions.title: Exploration Geoscientist

profile_positions.description: In a R&D team that focusses on advanced seismic interpretation, my responsibilities are to discover, develop, and globally deploy industry-leading seismic interpretation tools and techniques within Shell, that enhancing Shell's ability to rapidly evaluate exploration acreage by identifying subtle stratigraphic traps and quickly asses structural evolution in seismic data. Furthermore, I support Operating Units globally with these tools on a project basis.
profile_positions.title: Research Geologist

profile_positions.description:
I work with seismic interpretation, structural software, fractures and faults, stress and paleostress, with both an interest in the scientific background and the impact on oil and gas industry
Have a look at my website: http://www.ged.rwth-aachen.de/Ww/people/heijn/heijn_index.html

Supervisors. Hans Doornenbal and Dr Petra David.
